Some basic commands

```{r, global_options,include=F}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(eval = F) # disable eval
```
## Basic navigation
```{r}
ls # show all elements in directory
cd # change directory
cd .. # up the tree in the directory
pwd # show working directory
```

##Set up a git repository
```{r}
git init 

```
